headline: Ask HN: Best way to include LaTeX math in presentation slides?
description:
For my work, I often have to present scientific topics to an audience. This often includes a fair amount of notation in form of LaTeX math that has to go into the presentation slides.

So far, I have not found a good solution to efficiently include LaTeX in any presentation software.

There are plugins, but they rely on a local LaTeX distribution which, let's be honest, is always a pain to manage.

These days, I find myself using a browser app to render equations, then download and import the math as SVG or PNG. This somewhat works: The problem is that I have yet to find a web app that supports bot, a wide range of commands (like https://katex.org/) or the export to SVG (like https://viereck.ch/latex-to-svg/).

Any suggestions how to optimize my workflow?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 将LaTeX数学纳入演示文稿幻灯片的最佳方式？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 將LaTeX數學納入演示文稿幻燈片的最佳方式？
description_zh-Hans:
因为我的工作，我经常要向听众介绍科学课题。

到目前为止，我还没有找到一个好的解决方案来有效地将LaTeX纳入任何演示软件中。

有一些插件，但它们依赖于本地的LaTeX分布，说实话，管理起来总是很麻烦。

这些天，我发现自己使用一个浏览器应用程序来渲染方程，然后下载并导入数学的SVG或PNG。这在一定程度上是可行的。问题是，我还没有找到一个支持bot、各种命令（如https://katex.org/）或 输出为SVG（如https://viereck.ch/latex-to-svg/）。

有什么建议可以优化我的工作流程吗？
